meanings.definition: The fact or condition of happening unexpectedly or abruptly.
meanings.sent1: The suddenness of the power outage caught us off guard.
meanings.sent2: The suddenness of the applause after the performance was heartwarming.
meanings.sent3: The suddenness of the cake disappearing from the kitchen counter was mysterious.
meanings.sent4: The suddenness of the news spread through the office like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The suddenness of the train whistle broke the silence of the night.
